channel.title: Client Help | Mac
channel.description:
I am on a Mac and I get this error when trying to run a client [code]Last login: Thu Jan 30 20:20:28 on ttyp1 Welcome to Darwin! Codys-Macbook-Pro:~ User$ cd /Users/User/Desktop/Project\ Purple/ Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$ java -Xmx500m EGUI java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:620) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:124) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Exception in thread "main" Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$ Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$
[/code]
please help :P

item.title: Client Help | Mac
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:


Change the backslash \ to a "/" and see if that works ;D

Change the backslash \ to a “/” and see if that works ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help | Mac
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

I am on a Mac and I get this error when trying to run a client

[code]Last login: Thu Jan 30 20:20:28 on ttyp1
Welcome to Darwin!
Codys-Macbook-Pro:~ User$ cd /Users/User/Desktop/Project\ Purple/
Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$ java -Xmx500m EGUI
java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version number in .class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:620)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:124)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)
Exception in thread “main” Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$
Codys-Macbook-Pro:~/Desktop/Project Purple User$

[/code]

please help
